item.title: Man Arrested in Beating of Woman at Rufus Du Sol Rose Bowl Concert Captured in Viral Video
item.description: A suspect has been arrested in the beating of a woman at a Rüfüs Du Sol concert at the Rose Bowl Stadium in Pasadena, Calif., an incident that was captured by a fellow concertgoer in a video that went
